about_the_game:
Lords Mobile

Lords Mobile is a Strategy game that immerses players in epic Clan Wars battles.

In Lords Mobile, engage in intense Clan Wars and strategic gameplay in this thrilling online strategy game.

Prepare for an epic clash like never before in Lords Mobile, an online real-time strategy game that takes the essence of Gamers to a whole new level!

[Game Features]:

👑 Assemble Your Army of Legends 👑
The once-mighty Emperor has fallen, and now the realm cries out for a true hero, a Lord who can unite the fractured Kingdoms. Recruit legendary heroes from diverse backgrounds, including dwarves, mermaids, dark elves, and steampunk robots. Forge your unique army in this enchanting world and embark on a quest to establish your empire in the realm of strategy and ClanWars!

🏆 Collect Relics of Power 🏆
Explore the sacred Relic Chamber to unearth ancient relics of immense power. Enhance and upgrade them to unlock their full potential, granting you the edge in the battle for supremacy.

🏰 Conquer the Vergeway 🏰
For fans of tower defense, the Vergeway beckons! Collect and upgrade a variety of cards, strategize and adapt to overcome challenging stages, and put your tactical genius to the test as you face off against nefarious foes lurking within the Verge.

🏗️ Build Your Sovereign Realm 🏗️
Ascend to greatness by upgrading your structures, conducting groundbreaking research, training formidable troops, leveling up your Heroes, and steering your Kingdom towards prosperity in this strategic masterpiece.

🛡️ Master the Art of Formation 🛡️
Choose from four distinct troop types and six versatile troop formations to devise your battle strategies. Outsmart your adversaries by leveraging a counter system and aligning your troops with the right Heroes. Perfectionize your tactics to vanquish your foes!

🌟 Mighty Heroes Await 🌟
Assemble a formidable team of five Heroes and embark on an epic RPG-style campaign. Allow them to lead your realm to glory as valiant warlords!

🤝 Form Unbreakable Alliances 🤝
Join forces with like-minded warriors in guilds and take the battlefield by storm. Together, you'll conquer thrilling events, including Guild Wars, Kingdom Versus Kingdom clashes, Battle Royales, Wonder Wars, Darknest Invasions, and more!

🌐 Global Rivalries 🌐
Engage in intense clashes with millions of players worldwide. Crush those who dare to obstruct your path to supremacy! Seize the throne and reign supreme in this extraordinary strategy game!

⚔️ Animated Warfare ⚔️
Experience the exhilaration of battle as your armies clash in stunning 3D graphics. Witness your Heroes unleash their awe-inspiring skills and harness their mystical powers in epic battles that will leave you breathless!

name: Lords Mobile

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) или выше
  • Processor: (CPU): Intel Core i3 (Desktop).
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Lords Mobile is an online strategy game that combines the excitement of clanwars
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
